parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
Deceit, guile, treachery. From an obsolete primary verb, dello; a trick, i.e. wile.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
